```{r include=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(lubridate)
library(googledrive)

file_link <- "https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pH0zGLKzuQz9KqixikuPythYqgINWWob/view?usp=sharing"
sepsis <- drive_read_string(file_link) %>%
  read_csv()
```

```{r}
print("yes")
```


Table of all patients with sepsis and their vital signs:

```{r}
#Table 1
sepsis %>% filter(SepsisLabel==1) %>%
        select(-ICULOS, -SepsisLabel, -lastUpdate)
```

The changes in parameters in all patients with sepsis:

```{r}
sepsis %>% filter(SepsisLabel==1) %>%
        #############
```

Plots of changes in parameters for all patients who currently have sepsis:

```{r}
sepsis %>% filter(SepsisLabel==1) %>%
```
